name: Lentil Stew
keywords: fall, winter, high fiber, main course

recipeInstructions.text:
Cook coarse-chopped slab bacon in olive oil until
done; add chopped onion, carrot and celery, and cook
for a few minutes. Add lentils and any stock to
cover; bring to a boil, then reduce heat and slowly
simmer until lentils are tender. Garnish: Parsley.
